pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Passive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Swamps and Nether Forests in Trees.$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 1-3 $(item)Slime Balls$() (1-3 $(item)Magma Cream$() for Nether Tree Frog)

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Tree Frogs are neat little ambient mobs that spawn around swamp areas. They hop around and just act adorable. Not much to them, but if you enjoy it. Then find one and take it home with a Critter Cage!
